products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Loft Blind
products.metadescription: Palermo (blackout), yellow - loft blind made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bath
products.productdescription: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor.Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Roller, 4073 Bright Yellow - VELUX Loft Blind
products.metadescription: Roller, 4073 bright yellow - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.Offers both privacy and good looks.Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system.Fully integrated into the roof window.For an addition
products.productdescription: Softens the incoming light.Offers both privacy and good looks.Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system.Fully integrated into the roof window.For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience! The solar-rechargeable battery holds enough charge for up to 600 operations, even if there is no direct sunlight for recharging. Please note that the wall mounted control can also be used as a free standing remote control or if necessary, the blind can also be operated manually.

products.title: Metallic Gold (1263)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure metallic gold (1263) velux pleated blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux pleated blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside.

 	Softly diffuses incoming daylight.
 	Elegant, decorative lighting effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Slim, elegant side rails and top case.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	20 different colours and designs.

products.title: Yellow (1160)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure yellow (1160) velux energy blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux energy blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.

 	Blackout effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Improved insulation.
 	Sleek design - no visible cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	12 colour choices.
